Class JustBrowseSidePaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.enhanced.fxmlrelated.EnhancedFXMLController
      • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.fxmlControllers.JustBrowseSidePaneController

  • public class JustBrowseSidePaneController
extends EnhancedFXMLController
    This class controls the sidepane of an unregistered customer.

    Created on the 24th of October, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy

      • activateController

        protected void activateController()
        Description copied from class: EnhancedFXMLController
        This method should implement all the steps that turn an initialized & "unlinked" controller into a "linked" one.

        By default this method calls EnhancedFXMLController.activateValidators(), EnhancedFXMLController.activateListeners() ()}, EnhancedFXMLController.activateListeners() ()} and EnhancedFXMLController.activateEventHandlers() ()} in this order.

        Specified by:
        activateController in class EnhancedFXMLController
